MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Glen Avenue. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged underground cable located at 1 Glen Avenue and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.48pm on Wednesday, 06 January 2021.
